item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, October 28, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Volkswagen plans to close at least 3 German plants and cut thousands of jobs
2. Japan plunged into political turmoil after voters punish ruling LDP
3. Trump’s Madison Square Garden rally overshadowed by racism accusations
4. Shanghai cracks down on Halloween costumes
5. Iran’s supreme leader signals measured response to Israel’s attack
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, October 28, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
